entry.data:
CLOUDY WITH A 20 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS AROUND 17
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW AND RAIN
A CHANCE OF FREEZING RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 30
LOWS 10 TO 15

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
